amendment.description: At the end of title V, add the following: SEC. XX. GAO STUDY ON AVIATION WORKFORCE. (a) In General- Not later than 180 days after the date of enactment of this Act, the Comptroller General of the United States shall initiate a study, based on previous studies, that looks at the current and future supply of individuals in the aviation workforce. ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 68 printed in Part A of House Report 115-650 to direct the Comptroller General to assess the current state of the aviation workforce, barriers to entry to the aviation workforce, and options to increase the future supply of individuals in the aviation workforce.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (NE) amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Smith (NE).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Smith (NE) amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
